data.title: OFFBEAT – Short Film
data.meta_description: Directed by Arno Salters, Written by Gabriel Bisset Smith, Produced by Oliver Roskill, Emily Leo & Lucan Toh @ Wigwam Films + XYZ Films, Shot by Ben Magahy, Art Directed by James Hatt, Cut by D…
data.text:
Directed by Arno Salters, Written by Gabriel Bisset Smith, Produced by Oliver Roskill, Emily Leo & Lucan Toh @ Wigwam Films + XYZ Films, Shot by Ben Magahy, Art Directed by James Hatt, Cut by Dom Leung @ Trim, Grade by Paul Harrison @ FreeFolk. Post by Outpost VFX, Sound by Roland Heap @ Sound Disposition. Music – ‘Fight the Power’ by Public Enemy remixed by Cut Killer & DJ Abdel.

Starring – Joe Sutherland, Gurjeet Singh, Joshua Pascoe, Anwar Ellis, Dylan Corbett Bader.

Shot in London
